definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom

sentences.english: A simple model for heat transfer analysis of flat-plate heat exchanger with Phase Change Material ( PCM )is built.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板式相變貯能換熱器的無量綱傳熱模型。

sentences.english: The light will illuminate clearly immeasurable, innumerable, inconceivable Buddhas' World Realms in the ten directions.
sentences.chinese: 徹照十方無量無數不可思議諸佛世界。

sentences.english: At any rate the theoretical prospect seems no longer precluded.
sentences.chinese: 至少從理論上來說，這項事業似乎前途無量。

sentences.english: which is dimensionless, we call that strain.
sentences.chinese: 它是無量綱的，我們稱之爲拉力。

sentences.english: And every one of the Buddhas emits infinite and boundless light. These lights do not obstruct one another.
sentences.chinese: 每一個佛都是這樣子放光，無量無邊的。

sentences.english: The Buddha of Eternal Life has a long lasting, immeasurable, ineffable lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 無量壽佛，壽命長久，不可稱計。

sentences.english: The lifting velocity of well Winches is optimized by dimensionless parameters in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文用無量綱提升參數，對立井提升速度進行了優化。

sentences.english: In immeasurable, inconceivable, innumerable kalpas ago.
sentences.chinese: 過去無量不可思議無央數劫。

sentences.english: Amitabha Buddha emitted uncountable lights from his palm which pervasively illuminated all the Buddhalands.
sentences.chinese: 阿彌陀佛即於掌中放無量光，普照一切諸佛世界。

sentences.english: Now I start each day by reading from a buddhist scripture called aparimitayur sutra .
sentences.chinese: 現在，我以閱讀佛經《無量壽經》開始一天的生活。

sentences.english: E.g. Amitabha Buddha (Amituofo) has infinite life for helping countless beings in Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 無量佛陀在極樂世界無窮盡的生命普度衆生。

sentences.english: Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measures.
sentences.chinese: 我們最恐懼的是我們前途無量。

sentences.english: The paper advocates using extreme method for non-dimension of indicators.
sentences.chinese: 對於指標的無量綱化處理，本文主張採用極值化方法。

sentences.english: That young ball player will bear watching.
sentences.chinese: 那位青年球員前途無量。

sentences.english: Therefore it is clear that loving-kindness is more powerful than the other three sublime mental states.
sentences.chinese: 因此明顯地慈愛比其他三無量心更爲有力。

sentences.english: Hearing this, other bodhisattvas will practice this Dharma and so fulfill their innumerable great vows.
sentences.chinese: 菩薩聞已，修行此法，緣致滿足無量大願。

definition: tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha 佛, the Dharma 法 (his teaching), and the Sangha 僧 (his monastic order)
